includedAssets.title: Into the Ring
includedAssets.synopsis: Blinded as a child in an accident that enhanced his other senses, lawyer Matt Murdock vows to fight organised crime as a masked vigilante.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Blinded as a child in an accident that enhanced his other senses, lawyer Matt Murdock vows to fight organised crime as a masked vigilante.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Blinded as a child in an accident that enhanced his other senses, lawyer Matt Murdock vows to fight organised crime as a masked vigilante.

includedAssets.title: Cut Man
includedAssets.synopsis: Matt finds a welcome ally after his attempts to rescue a kidnapped boy leave him in a desperate state.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Matt finds a welcome ally after his attempts to rescue a kidnapped boy leave him in a desperate state.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Matt finds a welcome ally after his attempts to rescue a kidnapped boy leave him in a desperate state.

includedAssets.title: Rabbit in a Snowstorm
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep3 - Rabbit in a Snowstorm
includedAssets.synopsis: When Nelson and Murdock are asked to defend a professional criminal, Matt uses the case to discover more about their client's employer.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When Nelson and Murdock are asked to defend a professional criminal, Matt uses the case to discover more about their client's employer.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When Nelson and Murdock are asked to defend a professional criminal, Matt uses the case to discover more about their client's employer.

includedAssets.title: In the Blood
includedAssets.synopsis: As Fisk looks to grow his influence in Hell's Kitchen, Matt must take on a two brutal Russian mobsters looking to hit him close to home.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Fisk looks to grow his influence in Hell's Kitchen, Matt must take on a two brutal Russian mobsters looking to hit him close to home.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Fisk looks to grow his influence in Hell's Kitchen, Matt must take on a two brutal Russian mobsters looking to hit him close to home.

includedAssets.title: World on Fire
includedAssets.synopsis: Fisk moves in on the Russians, as Matt desperately tries to both uncover his plan and help Foggy defend a victimised tenant.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Fisk moves in on the Russians, as Matt desperately tries to both uncover his plan and help Foggy defend a victimised tenant.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Fisk moves in on the Russians, as Matt desperately tries to both uncover his plan and help Foggy defend a victimised tenant.

includedAssets.title: Condemned
includedAssets.synopsis: While Ben gets dangerously close to a breakthrough, Matt tries to keep Vladimir alive long enough to get information on Fisk.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Ben gets dangerously close to a breakthrough, Matt tries to keep Vladimir alive long enough to get information on Fisk.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Ben gets dangerously close to a breakthrough, Matt tries to keep Vladimir alive long enough to get information on Fisk.

includedAssets.title: Stick
includedAssets.synopsis: Despite closing in on Owlsley, Matt is forced to turn his attention to a new threat when his old mentor returns to Hell's Kitchen.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Despite closing in on Owlsley, Matt is forced to turn his attention to a new threat when his old mentor returns to Hell's Kitchen.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Despite closing in on Owlsley, Matt is forced to turn his attention to a new threat when his old mentor returns to Hell's Kitchen.

includedAssets.title: Shadows in the Glass
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep8 - Shadows in the Glass
includedAssets.synopsis: Fisk is forced to make a drastic choice after Matt's actions create conflict between him, Owlsley, Nobu and Gao.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Fisk is forced to make a drastic choice after Matt's actions create conflict between him, Owlsley, Nobu and Gao.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Fisk is forced to make a drastic choice after Matt's actions create conflict between him, Owlsley, Nobu and Gao.

includedAssets.title: Speak of the Devil
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep9 - Speak of the Devil
includedAssets.synopsis: Matt looks for something to use against Fisk, who gains the upper hand and dispatches a specialist to deal with the masked vigilante.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Matt looks for something to use against Fisk, who gains the upper hand and dispatches a specialist to deal with the masked vigilante.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Matt looks for something to use against Fisk, who gains the upper hand and dispatches a specialist to deal with the masked vigilante.

includedAssets.title: Nelson v. Murdock
includedAssets.synopsis: Matt tries to justify his second life to Foggy, while Karen tries to convince Ben to keep up the investigation into Fisk's past.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Matt tries to justify his second life to Foggy, while Karen tries to convince Ben to keep up the investigation into Fisk's past.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Matt tries to justify his second life to Foggy, while Karen tries to convince Ben to keep up the investigation into Fisk's past.

includedAssets.title: The Path of the Righteous
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep11 - The Path of the Righteous
includedAssets.synopsis: With Fisk refusing to leave Marianna's side, Ben and Karen try to figure out what to do with their new information.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With Fisk refusing to leave Marianna's side, Ben and Karen try to figure out what to do with their new information.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With Fisk refusing to leave Marianna's side, Ben and Karen try to figure out what to do with their new information.

includedAssets.title: The Ones We Leave Behind
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep12 - The Ones We Leave Behind
includedAssets.synopsis: Karen struggles to come to terms with her actions, Matt takes on Gao and Fisk goes on the warpath.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Karen struggles to come to terms with her actions, Matt takes on Gao and Fisk goes on the warpath.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Karen struggles to come to terms with her actions, Matt takes on Gao and Fisk goes on the warpath.

includedAssets.title: Daredevil
includedAssets.synopsis: Matt, Foggy and Karen redouble their efforts to finally get Fisk, who is forced to resort to desperate measures. Season finale.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Matt, Foggy and Karen redouble their efforts to finally get Fisk, who is forced to resort to desperate measures. Season finale.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Matt, Foggy and Karen redouble their efforts to finally get Fisk, who is forced to resort to desperate measures. Season finale.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Charlie Cox stars as Matt Murdock, a lawyer blinded as a child by a toxic chemical spill that increased his other senses to superhuman levels. Combining these incredible powers with his martial arts mastery, Murdock fights for justice on the streets of Hell’s Kitchen, New York. Hit comic book adaptation also starring Vincent D'Onofrio.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Charlie Cox is Matt Murdock, a blind lawyer and martial arts master who fights injustice in Hell’s Kitchen. Comic book action with Vincent D'Onofrio.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Charlie Cox stars as Matt Murdock, a lawyer blinded as a child by a toxic chemical spill that increased his other senses to superhuman levels. Combining these incredible powers with his martial arts mastery, Murdock fights for justice on the streets of Hell’s Kitchen, New York. Hit comic book adaptation also starring Vincent D'Onofrio.
